pr_title: Add AfterClass method to cleanup DLP Triggers and Templates

timeline.message: add AfterClass method to cleanup job triggers and templates

timeline.bodyText: This might be a bit too aggressive as your deleting all existing templates, some might actually be in use by another test running at the same time.
timeline.author: lesv

timeline.bodyText: Ideally, you'll just clean up the ones you've created for testing.
timeline.author: lesv

timeline.message: delete only the jobs created in the tests
